resources.string: No Location Detected Check Your Location Setting

Hi there !

Thank you for signing up your NGO with us ! We are excited to work together in the future. At this point we need to verify a few details before your account can be activated. Generally activation should not take more than 1 working day.
 
If there is anything urgent please send us an email at: donations@petoandme.com and we will respond to you at the earliest (within 24 hours).
